#include<stdio.h>
#define LL long long
#include<stdlib.h>

struct Team
{
	int index;
	LL score;
};

int compare_score(const void* a,const void* b)
{
	struct Team* x=(struct Team*)a;
	struct Team* y=(struct Team*)b;
	LL score=(y->score)-(x->score);
	if(score!=0)
	{
		if(score>0) return 1;
		else return -1;
	}
	else
	{
		return (x->index)-(y->index);
	}
}

main()
{
	LL S,M;
	int i,N,Q,K;
	struct Team A[10005];
	scanf("%d",&N);
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&S,&M);
		A[i].score=S*M;
		A[i].index=i+1;
	}
	qsort(A,N,sizeof(struct Team),compare_score);
	scanf("%d",&Q);
	while(Q--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&K);
		printf("%d\n",A[K-1].index);
	}
	return 0;
}
